title: Did Fox News Ignore News of Paul Manafort’s Indictment and Cover a Cheeseburger Emoji Controversy Instead?
subtitle: A joke about Fox News' coverage of Paul Manafort's indictment morphed into claims that the network failed to cover the political news at all.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Fox News didn't report breaking political news about the indictment of Paul Manafort and instead ran coverage of controversy involving a cheeseburger emoji.
